In Israel, police arrest an ultra-Orthodox assailant...
...who attacked and injured six people at an annual gay pride parade in Jerusalem.
In Palestine, hundreds attend the funeral for a toddler...
...who was killed in a suspected Jewish arson attack near Nablus.
In France, local workers continue to search Reunion Island beaches for debris...
...and hope for a link to the missing Malaysia airliner.
And finally from Malaysia, Beijing was chosen by the International Olympic Committee...
